0: You know what the Midwest is? Young and restless
1: Where restless (niggas) might snatch your necklace
2: And next these (niggas) might jack your Lexus
3: Somebody tell these (niggas) who Kanye West is
4: I walk through the valley of the Chi where death is
5: Top floor the view alone will leave you breathless *gasps*
6: Try to catch it *gasps* it's kinda hard
7: Getting choked by detectives, yeah, yeah, now check the method
8: They be askin' us questions, harass and arrest us
9: Sayin' "We eat pieces of shit like you for breakfast"
10: Huh? Y'all eat pieces of shit? What's the basis?
11: We ain't going nowhere but got suits and cases
12: A trunk full of coke, rental car from Avis
13: My mama used to say only Jesus can save us
14: Well mama I know I act a fool
15: But I'll be gone 'til November, I got packs to move
17: To the hustlers, killers, murderers, drug dealers, even the scrippers
19: To the victims of welfare for we livin' in Hell here, hell yeah
21: Now, hear ye, hear ye, want to see Thee more clearly
22: I know he hear me when my feet get weary
23: Cause we're the almost nearly extinct
24: We rappers is role models: we rap, we don't think
25: I ain't here to argue about his facial features
26: Or here to convert atheists into believers
27: I'm just tryna say the way school need teachers
28: The way Kathie Lee needed Regis, that's the way I need Jesus
29: So here go my single dog, radio needs this
30: They say you can rap about anything except for Jesus
31: That means guns, sex, lies, videotape
32: But if I talk about God my record won't get played, huh?
33: Well if this take away from my spins
34: Which'll probably take away from my ends
35: Then I hope this take away from my sins
36: And bring the day that I'm dreamin' about
37: Next time I'm in the club, everybody screamin' out
title: Jesus Walks
